short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quality of life improvements for Mavenlink.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension modifies Mavenlink/Kantata pages to provide a better user experience.

Features:
- Shows aggregate data on the timesheets page.
  - Total time tracked per day.
  - Total time tracked per project for the week, including separate totals for billable and non-billable time.
